welcome_message_body: Welcome to Norwell, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the beauty and charm this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting the network and entering a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Plymouth Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights for airlines such as American, JetBlue, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest and busiest at Logan Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights for airlines such as United, Virgin Atlantic, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to international flights and serves a variety of airlines such as Emirates, British Airways, and Aer Lingus.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a one-time registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger comfort.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's complimentary WiFi network throughout the terminals.
